titleStmt.title: An order by the Commissioners of the Admirality and the Navy concerning the payment of the prize-money due to seamen and souldiers, and their widows, that have served at sea in this last years expedition. 16 January, 1653.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Commissioners of the Admiralty and the Navy.
Desborough, John, 1608-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Laurence Blaiklock, and T. Hewer,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: Ro: Blackborne Secre:.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
